name: Mt. Conatus
description:
A game about walking in the woods.

This game is more of a personal journey to me and most likely to my dev partner as well, as both of us had next to none experience working in 3D prior to this. Our goal was simply to make the best looking and immersive environments we could with our limited knowledge, and to learn along the way. It took us a long time and a lot of effort, but here's finally what we have to show for it. All I can say is I'm proud of what I've achieved with this, and I'm sure Kynrico feels the same. It's not anything perfect, but I hope our honest effort shows through this.

Also thanks to MrXob and his screen for testing this thing lol

Thank you for reading.

-aBlueHuman
